description: I am 57. I am looking for an Israeli girl btween 25-40 years of age. I am college educated and intelligent. I am retired from foodservice after 37 years. I love to sing and I have an awesome sense of humor. It does not take much to make me laugh. I have a 14 year old daughter who is my reason for living and my best buddy, Stinky. I am looking to go walkabout and would to share the adventure.
